text:
BCCI issues Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for IPL 2021, enlisting bio-secure protocols for the tournament. 

Players can directly enter franchise bubble from their bubbles of national teams. 

#BCCI #IPL2021 #COVID19 #IPLNews #BioBubble #SOPs #Cricket #IPL #Vaccine https://t.co/eue1e7qCHE
